item.title: 微软耗资巨大的数据中心扩建遇阻
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，我们的每日时事通讯提供彭博社全球记者对科技商业的报道和分析。今天，布罗迪-福特（Brody Ford）报道了可能会减缓昂贵的数据中心扩张计划的因素，这些计划旨在满足微软等公司对云和人工智能的需求。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Brody Ford reports on the factors that may slow expensive data center expansion plans aimed at meeting cloud and AI demand from the likes of Microsoft.】

item.title: 特朗普关税与日益加深的中国冲击相冲突
item.description: 我是肖恩-唐南（Shawn Donnan），华盛顿经济学资深撰稿人。今天，我们将探讨世界经济面临的双重冲击。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Shawn Donnan, a senior writer for economics in Washington. item.title: 日本在美国关税谈判中名列前茅
item.description: 早在上世纪 80 年代，商人唐纳德-特朗普就是一名贸易保护主义者，当时日本是国内制造商的最大威胁。四十年后的今天，特朗普总统在贸易战中对日本表现出了一定的礼貌，因为中国已成为其最大的竞争对手。【原文：Donald Trump the businessman came of age as a protectionist back in the 1980s, when Japan was the biggest threat to domestic manufacturers. Four decades later, Trump the president is showing Japan some courtesy in his trade wars now that China is the top competitor.】

item.title: 苹果历史性大跌令多头对关税风险望而却步
item.description: 苹果公司股价的大幅下挫表明，投资者对该公司是否有能力应对唐纳德-特朗普总统对中国、越南和印度征收的关税持怀疑态度。【原文：A sharp selloff in shares of Apple Inc. illustrates investor skepticism about its ability to navigate President Donald Trump’s tariffs on China, Vietnam and India — countries all critical to the iPhone maker’s supply chain.】

item.title: 交易员押注 "疯狂 "货币波动将持续下去
item.description: 随着贸易战的升级动摇了全球经济秩序，货币交易员们正将货币市场的动荡定位为更加严重。【原文：Currency traders are positioning for turbulence in currency markets to get even worse as an escalating trade war shakes up the global economic order.】

item.title: 丹麦 Arla 和德国 DMK 将打造欧洲乳业巨头
item.description: 丹麦的 Arla Foods 和德国的 DMK 集团计划合并为一家合作社，将 12,000 多名农民联合起来，打造欧洲乳业巨头。【原文：Denmark’s Arla Foods and Germany’s DMK Group plan to merge into one cooperative, bringing together more than 12,000 farmers to create a European dairy giant.】

item.title: 德国电价将居高不下，与天然气的联系将更加紧密
item.description: 由于未来几年与天然气的联系将得到加强，德国的电价将继续走高。【原文：Electricity prices in Germany will remain elevated as their link to natural gas is poised to strengthen over the coming years.】

item.title: 世界银行将为肯尼亚提供 7.5 亿美元资金与改革目标挂钩
item.description: 世界银行表示，将为肯尼亚释放更多融资，条件是东非经济体实施去年达成的广泛经济改革。【原文：The World Bank will unlock further financing for Kenya on condition that the East African economy implements wide-ranging economic reforms agreed on last year, according to the lender.】

item.title: 多伦多 Tailscale 获得新融资，估值达到 15 亿美元
item.description: 总部位于多伦多的安全初创公司 Tailscale Inc.已从投资者那里筹集到 1.6 亿美元，这对这家加拿大公司来说是一笔巨额资金。据一位不愿透露姓名的知情人士透露，这笔交易对这家初创公司的估值为 15 亿美元。【原文：Tailscale Inc., a security startup based in Toronto, has raised $160 million from investors — a significant haul for the Canadian company. The deal values the startup at $1.5 billion according to a person familiar with the matter who asked not to be identified discussing private information.】

item.title: 中国准备从美国转向巴西，巴西重要港口一片繁忙
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战可能会打压全球大宗商品价格，但对巴西最大的港口之一来说却是个好消息，该港口的出口量正在上升。【原文：Donald Trump’s trade war may have crushed global commodity prices, but it’s good news for one of Brazil’s largest ports, which is seeing an uptick in export volumes.】

item.title: 菲利普斯 66 在代理申请文件中回击埃利奥特激进主义
item.description: 根据菲利普斯 66 炼油公司周二提交的一份最终代理声明，该公司正敦促股东投票反对其所认为的激进投资者埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）拆分公司的短期企图。【原文：Phillips 66 is urging shareholders to vote against what it sees as activist investor Elliott Investment Management’s short-term attempts to dismantle the company, according to a definitive proxy statement filed by the refiner Tuesday.】

item.title: 关税闹剧重创科技和黄金，加拿大股市黯然失色
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税，那些将多伦多上市股票作为躲避美国科技下滑的避风港的投资基金经理们改变了这一建议。【原文：Investment fund managers who pitched Toronto-listed stocks as a place to hide from a US technology downturn have changed that advice because of President Donald Trump’s tariffs.】

item.title: Meta 将青少年安全保护措施扩展至 Facebook 和 Messenger
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司正在扩大对使用其 Instagram、Facebook 和 Messenger 应用程序的青少年用户的保护，这是该公司最近一次试图平息批评该社交网络公司伤害青少年的声音。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. is expanding protections for teen users of its Instagram, Facebook and Messenger apps, the latest attempt to quiet critics who say the social-networking company is harming the young.】

item.title: 美国小型企业乐观程度创 2022 年中以来最大降幅
item.description: 由于对特朗普政府全面关税政策后的商业环境和销售前景的担忧加剧，美国小型企业的乐观情绪在上个月出现了自2022年6月以来的最大降幅。【原文：US small-business optimism fell last month by the most since June 2022 as concerns intensified about the prospects for business conditions and sales in the wake of the Trump administration’s sweeping tariff policies.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚总理任命提格雷州新领导人以缓和紧张局势
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚任命塔德塞-沃雷德（Tadesse Worede）为提格雷大区临时主席，以缓和这个北部动荡省份的紧张局势。【原文：Ethiopia appointed Tadesse Worede as interim president of the Tigray region in a bid to defuse tensions in the restive northern province.】

item.title: 星展银行认为特朗普加征关税后亚洲和非洲的贸易流量将增加
item.description: 新加坡最大的银行星展集团控股有限公司（DBS Group Holdings Ltd.）预计，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）最近几轮加征关税的背景下，亚洲、中东和非洲之间的贸易往来将会增加，该银行计划为此类业务提供支持。【原文：Singapore’s biggest bank DBS Group Holdings Ltd. expects more trade flows between Asia, the Middle East and Africa, with the lender planning to support such business amid the latest rounds of tariff hikes by US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 欧洲央行西姆库斯呼吁在美国关税打击后于 4 月降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员格迪米纳斯-西姆库斯（Gediminas Simkus）表示，由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税攻势，欧洲中央银行下周应降低利率。【原文：The European Central Bank should lower interest rates next week because of US President Donald Trump’s tariff offensive, according to Governing Council member Gediminas Simkus.】

item.title: 华尔街为贸易战导致的企业盈利下滑做好准备
item.description: 受唐纳德-特朗普总统关税影响的美国股市本周晚些时候将面临另一个重大考验：企业盈利。而它们的前景并不乐观。【原文：US stocks reeling from the impact of President Donald Trump’s tariffs face another big test starting later this week: corporate earnings. And they’re not looking good.】

item.title: 据说 SBI 正在考虑出售加密货币部门 B2C2 的少数股权
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，日本金融服务集团 SBI 控股公司（SBI Holdings Inc.【原文：A unit of Japanese financial services conglomerate SBI Holdings Inc. is exploring selling a minority stake in cryptocurrency market maker B2C2, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度国家领导人表示，印度金融中心将经受住关税风暴的考验
item.description: 马哈拉施特拉邦首席部长周二在印度全球论坛上表示，尽管关税声明引发了全球动荡，但投资者仍然看好马哈拉施特拉邦。【原文：Investors remain bullish on Maharashtra despite the global turmoil caused by the tariff announcements, the state’s chief minister said Tuesday at the India Global Forum.】

item.title: 日本民主党领袖提出：若关税抑制经济，日本央行将降息
item.description: 日本一个主要反对党的领导人表示，日本央行可能不得不扭转政策方向，不仅搁置任何加息的想法，而且还准备在美国关税损害经济的情况下考虑下调基准利率。【原文：The leader of a key opposition party in Japan said the central bank may have to reverse course on policy, not only putting aside any notions of hiking interest rates but also being prepared to mull a cut to the benchmark if US tariffs damage the economy.】

item.title: 米莱伊试图抹去阿根廷历史以吸引外国投资
item.description: 哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）在将这个南美国家重新打造为自由市场天堂的过程中，正试图铲除阿根廷主要的民粹主义流派--庇隆主义（Peronism）的一切残余。【原文：Javier Milei is trying to stamp out every vestige of Peronism, Argentina’s dominant strain of populism, in his re-branding of the South American nation as a free-market haven.】

item.title: 乌克兰计划派特使赴美就矿产交易举行会谈
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，乌克兰官员将于本周末访问美国，就有关战后开采矿藏和重建基础设施计划的协议进行会谈。【原文：Ukrainian officials will visit the US at the end of this week for talks on a deal governing post-war plans to exploit mineral deposits and rebuild infrastructure, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 瑞士国家银行文件称瑞士黄金转口扭曲了美国贸易顺差
item.description: 瑞士国家银行（Swiss National Bank）的一份文件指出，在分析瑞士和美国的贸易关系时，不应将瑞士对美国的黄金出口额计算在内。【原文：Switzerland’s outsized gold exports to the US shouldn’t be included when analyzing the trade relationship between both economies, according to a paper from the Swiss National Bank.】

item.title: 游说团体称德国债务一揽子计划将增加 10 亿欧元银行收入
item.description: 由于政府计划增加国防和基础设施开支，德国金融业每年将增加 10 亿欧元（11 亿美元）的收入。【原文：Germany’s finance industry will see €1 billion ($1.1 billion) in additional revenues a year as a result of the government’s plan to boost spending on defense and infrastructure.】

item.title: 逊菲尔德在上周的动荡中获益，花旗国躲过一劫
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的关税大棒引发的全球股市动荡中，Schonfeld Strategic Advisors 取得了微弱的收益，而其他大型跨国对冲基金则避开了最严重的混乱局面。【原文：Schonfeld Strategic Advisors delivered modest gains amid the global stock-market upheaval unleashed by President Donald Trump’s tariff barrage while other large multistrategy hedge funds avoided the worst of the chaos.】
